                                        </div>

                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>হেবার প্রণালিতে সর্বোচ্চ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-296" style="width: 2.647em; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-299"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.269em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute;                                 <div class="row questionOptions">

                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1000</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>40</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>350</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.0357</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>L</mi><mo>;</mo><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>14</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.0357</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>12.55</mn></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-325" style="width: 16.559em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.568em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1013.53em, 5.945em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-326"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.568em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1012.79em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-327" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-328" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-329" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.994em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.83em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.432em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-330"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-331" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1000</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-332" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-333" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.3em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.145em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-334"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-335" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">40</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-336" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-337" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">350</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.99em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.994em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-338" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-339" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.0357</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-341" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-342" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-343" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-344"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-345"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-346" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-347" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-348" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1013.53em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -2.457em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-349" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-350" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-351" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-353" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">14</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-354" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-355" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">log</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-356"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-357" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-358"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-359"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-360" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-361" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.0357</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-362" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-363" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-364" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">12.55</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.248em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.402em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1000</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>40</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>350</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.0357</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>L</mi><mo>;</mo><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>14</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.0357</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>12.55</mn></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-23">C=\frac{1000\times0.5}{40\times350}=0.0357\ mol/L; \\ pH=14+\log{\left(0.0357\right)=12.55} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 8 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি উভমুখী বিক্রিয়ায়&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>P</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>35.5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-365" style="width: 5.553em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.547em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1004.51em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-366"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-367"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.455em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.9em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-368" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.859em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-369" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">P<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-370" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-371" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">35.5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-32-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>P</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0394;</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>758.96</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>K</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-436" style="width: 14.879em; top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-437"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-438"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.477em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-439" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-440" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">P<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-441" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-442" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.477em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-443" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-444" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-445"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.322em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.13em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-446"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-447" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-448"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-449" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">R</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-450" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">T<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-451" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.256em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-452"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-453"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-454" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">Δ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-455" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-456" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-457" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">T<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-458" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-459" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">758.96</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-460" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-461" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>P</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup><mo>∴</mo><mi>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>758.96</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>K</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-32">K_P=K_C\left(RT\right)^{\Delta n}\therefore T=758.96\ K </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <br>

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-515"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-516"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-517" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-518" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-519" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-520" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-521" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">8.42</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1011.11em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -2.539em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-522" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-523" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-524" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-525"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-526" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-527" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-528" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-529" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">14</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-530" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-531" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">p</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-532"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-533" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-534" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-535" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-536" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5.58</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>p</mi><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>b</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>8.42</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mi>p</mi><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>14</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>p</mi><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>b</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>5.58</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-36">pK_b=-\log{\left(3.8\times{10}^{-9}\right)}=8.42 \\
\therefore pK_a=14-pK_b=5.58 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 11 </span>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-42-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>7.48</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-595" style="width: 8.563em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.015em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1007.01em, 2.37em, -999.998em);                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>P</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msubsup><mi>P</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msub><mi>P</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msubsup><mi>P</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>P</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>9.14</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-662" style="width: 25.658em; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.603em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>P</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msubsup><mi>P</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msub><mi>P</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msubsup><mi>P</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>P</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>9.14</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-47">K_P=\frac{P_{NO_2}^2}{P_{N_2O_4}}\Rightarrow P_{N_2O_4}=\frac{P_{NO_2}^2}{K_P}=\frac{\left(8\times{10}^{-3}\right)^2}{7\times{10}^{-3}}=9.14\times{10}^{-3}\ atm </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 12 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>27°C&nbsp;তাপমাত্রায়&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>N</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1.62</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mi>M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-55">1.62\times{10}^{-5}M </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-56-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>P</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi><msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-923"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-924"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-925" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-926" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-927" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.598em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>P</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi><msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>∆</mo><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>×</mo><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>P</mi></msub><mrow><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>0.0821</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>300</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.62</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mi>M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-56">K_P=K_C (RT)^{∆n}=K_C×RT\\
\Rightarrow K_C=\frac{K_P}{RT}=\frac{4\times{10}^{-4}}{0.0821\times300}=1.62\times{10}^{-5}M </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 13 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি বাফার দ্রবণে প্রতি লিটারে&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.56</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></msub><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-928" style="width: 9.503em; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1040" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1041"><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1050" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1051" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.05</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.2em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.199em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1085" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1086" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">8.937</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.551em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.998em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.452em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>14</mn><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mi>b</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>s</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>H</mi><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>b</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>H</mi><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mn>14</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mrow><mn>1.01</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0.05</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0.56</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>0.05</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>8.937</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-61">pH=14-\left({\rm pK}_b+\log{\frac{n_{salt}+n_{HCl}}{n_{base}-n_{HCl}}}\right)\\
=14+\log{\left(1.8\times{10}^{-5}\right)-\log{\frac{1.01+0.05}{0.56-0.05}}}=8.937 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>আমরা জানি,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-65-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>p</mi><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>d</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>d</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>p</mi><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0.26</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0.55</mn><mo>&amp;#x2248;</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1109" style="width: 27.625em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 22.625em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.74em, 1022.62em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1110"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1111" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1112" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1113" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1114" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1115"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1116" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1182" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>p</mi><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>d</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>d</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>p</mi><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>0.26</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0.55</mn><mo>≈</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-65">pH=pK_a+ \log \frac{\left[salt\right]}{[acid]} \Rightarrow \frac{\left[salt\right]}{ [acid]} ={10}^{pH-pK_a}={10}^{-0.26}=0.55\approx\frac{5}{9}</script></span></p>
</span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><munder><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><munder><mstyle mathsize=&quot;1.44em&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></mrow></mstyle><mstyle mathsize=&quot;1.73em&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow></mstyle></munder></munder><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; }


</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-70-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>0.2</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1273" style="width: 6.846em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.617em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1005.53em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1274"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1275" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1276" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1277" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1278" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1279" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1280" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1281" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1282" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>0.2</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-70">\therefore\alpha=\frac{0.2}{2}=0.1</script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-71-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.45</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1283" style="width: 4.346em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.568em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1003.53em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1284"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1285"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.44</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>e</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1292" style="width: 7.256em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.945em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1005.7em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1293"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1294" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1295" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1296" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1297" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.44</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1298" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1299" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1300" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1301" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1302" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1303" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.44</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>e</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">\therefore a=0.44\ mole\  </script></span></p>

<p>[<strong>বিশেষ দ্রষ্টব্য:</strong> বিযোজনের পরিমাণ ও বিযোজন মাত্রা এ দুটো পদ নিয়ে অনেকের মধ্যে বিভ্রান্তির সৃষ্টি হয়।</p>

<p>যদি &zwj;a মোল পদার্থের&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1304" style="width: 2.584em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.092em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.05em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1305"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1306" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1307" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1308" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1309" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1310" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-73">\alpha\ mol </script></span>&nbsp;বিযোজিত হয়, তবে বিযোজনের পরিমাণ হচ্ছে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1311" style="width: 2.584em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.092em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.05em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1312"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1313" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1314" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1315" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1316" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1317" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-74">\alpha\ mol </script></span>&nbsp;। অপরদিকে ‘বিযোজন মাত্রা’ বলতে বোঝায় সে পদার্থের কত ভগ্নাংশ বিযোজিত হয়েছে সে সংখ্যা, অর্থাৎ বিযোজন মাত্রা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-75-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1318" style="width: 0.576em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.453em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1000.45em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1319"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1320" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>β</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-75">\beta</script></span>&nbsp;হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-76-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1321" style="width: 2.748em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.256em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.26em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1322"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1323" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1324" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1325" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.576em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1326" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1327" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.58em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.576em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>α</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-76">\beta=\frac{\alpha}{a}</script></span>&nbsp;। এ ভগ্নাংশকে অনেকক্ষেত্রে 100 দ্বারা গুণ করে শতকরা হিসাবে প্রকাশ করা হয়। যেমন,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-77-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1328" style="width: 5.125em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.182em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1004.18em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1329"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1330" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1331" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1332" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1333" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1334" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1336"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1337" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1338" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1339"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1340" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1341" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">5\ mol\ N_2O_4</script></span>&nbsp;নিয়ে উত্তপ্ত করার পর 2 mol বিযোজিত হলে ‘বিযোজনের পরিমাণ’ বলতে 2 mol বোঝাবে। অপরদিকে বিযোজন মাত্রা হচ্ছে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.4</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>0.4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>100</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>40</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1342" style="width: 12.133em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.92em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1009.88em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1343"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1344"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1345" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1346" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1347" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1348" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1349" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1351" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">100</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1353" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1354" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">40</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1355" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.4</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>0.4</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>40</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-78">\frac{2}{5}=0.4\Rightarrow0.4\times100=40\%</script></span>&nbsp;]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 16 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-79-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21CC;</mo><mi>C</mi><mi>O</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>O</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1356" style="width: 19.823em; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1373" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1374" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.263em;">⇌</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1375" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.263em;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1376" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1377" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1378" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1379" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1462"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1463" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1464"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1479"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1480" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1481" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1482" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1483" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1484" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1485" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1486" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">30</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1487" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1488" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.1333</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1489" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1490" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1491" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">Q</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1492" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1493" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&lt;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1494" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.477em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1495" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1496" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>O</mi></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>O</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>30</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1333</mn><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>&lt;</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>C</mi></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-83">Q_C= \frac{\left[CO\right][H_2O]}{\left[CO_2\right][H_2]} =\frac{2\times2}{5\times6}=\frac{4}{30}=0.1333\therefore Q_C<K_C</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-84-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1497" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1498"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1499" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-84">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;বিক্রিয়াটি সম্মুখমুখী।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 21 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21CC;</mo><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1580" style="width: 16.246em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.303em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.492em, 1013.19em, 2.908em, -999.998em); top: -2.457em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1581"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1582"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.486em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.114em; mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></msub><mrow><msubsup><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></msubsup><mo>×</mo><msubsup><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></msubsup></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">&amp;</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>N</mi><msubsup><mi>H</mi><mn>3</mn><mrow
