mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></msub><mrow><msubsup><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></msubsup><mo>×</mo><msubsup><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></msubsup></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></msup><mo>=</mo><mroot><msup><mi>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>5</mn></mroot></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-98">K=\frac{{\rm NH}_3}{N_2^{\frac{1}{2}}\times H_2^{\frac{3}{2}}}\ \&\ K_1=\frac{NH_3^{\frac{2}{5}}}{N_2^{\frac{1}{5}}\times H_2^{\frac{3}{5}}}=\left(\frac{{\rm NH}_3}{N_2^{\frac{1}{2}}\times H_2^{\frac{3}{2}}}\right)^\frac{2}{5}=\sqrt[5]{K^2}   </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 22 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>4&nbsp;pH&nbsp;বিশিষ্ট বাফার দ্রবণ তৈরি করতে হলে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-99-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>50</mn><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0.05</mn><mi>M</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1772" style="width: 6.895em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.628em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1005.63em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1773"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1774" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">50</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1775" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1776" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1777" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1778" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.05</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1779" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>50</mn><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>0.05</mn><mi>M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-99">50mL\ 0.05M</script></span>&nbsp;ফরমিক এসিড দ্রবণে কত আয়তন&nbsp;0.1M&nbsp;সোডিয়াম ফরমেট যোগ করতে হবে?&nbsp;[HCOOH&nbsp;এর&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;                                         </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ধরি,&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>H</mi><mi>C</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>N</mi><mi>a</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1788" style="width: 7.461em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>p</mi><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>l</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>g</mi><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi>H</mi><mi>C</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>N</mi><mi>a</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi>H</mi><mi>C</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1802" style="width: 12.01em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-103-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>3.8</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.05</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.05</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>0.2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>39.6</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1834" style="width: 25.617em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1001.15em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.572em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1862"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1863" style="font-size: 50%; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1868" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.625em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.8em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.941em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1869"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1870" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1871" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1872" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.46em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.268em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1873"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1874" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">50</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1875" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1876" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.05</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.62em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.625em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1877" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1878" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1879"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1880"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1881" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1882"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1883"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1884" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1885" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1886" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1887" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1888" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">39.6</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1889" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1890" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1891" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.953em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.198em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>3.8</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>0.1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.05</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>0.1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.05</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>0.2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>39.6</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-103">\therefore 4=3.8+\log{\left(\frac{\frac{x\times0.1}{50+x}}{\frac{50\times0.05}{50+x}}\right)}\Rightarrow\frac{x\times0.1}{50\times0.05}={10}^{0.2}\Rightarrow x=39.6\ mL </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 2.543em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </span>

                        </div>

            </div><div class="TakeExamHeader">
        
        
        

        <h3>Engineering Daily MCQ Practice Exam C-06</h3>
                        
                    
                    

    </div>
    <div class="TakeExamBody">
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 1 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>তাপমাত্রা বাড়ালে তাপোৎপাদী বিক্রিয়ার সাম্যাঙ্ক-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group StudentAns" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কমে যায়</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

</label>

                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>

height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.256em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-175"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-176"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-177" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-178" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>P</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi><msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>∆</mo><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">K_P=K_C( RT)^{∆n} =K_C\left(RT\right)^{2-2-1}=K_C\left(RT\right)^{-1}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>P</mi></msub><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.0821</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>303</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>7.46</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></msup><mi>L</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><msup><mi>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-179" style="width: 28.527em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 23.363em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1023.36em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-180"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-181" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-182" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.477em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-183" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-184" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-185" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-186" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.477em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-187" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-188" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">P<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-189" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-190" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">R</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-191" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">T<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-192" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-193" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-194" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-195" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-196"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-197"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-198" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-199" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-200" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-201" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.0821</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-203" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">303</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-205" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-208"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-209"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-210" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-211" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-212" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-213" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-214" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-215"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-216" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-217"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-218"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-219" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-220" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>P</mi></msub><mo>×</mo><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>0.0821</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>303</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>7.46</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></msup><mi>L</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><msup><mi>l</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-9">\Rightarrow K_C=K_P\times RT=3\times{10}^4\times0.0821\times303=7.46\times{10}^5Lmol^{-1} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>5.32</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group StudentAns" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>4.143</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>4.932</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 4 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: red">Incorrect</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>বাফার দ্রবণের বাফার ক্ষমতা সর্বোচ্চ হয় যখন-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-359" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.59em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-361" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.594em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-362"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-363"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-364" style="font-size: 70.7%; n_{acid}=n_{base} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 5 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>

width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-562" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-563" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>14</mn><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mi>b</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>s</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>H</mi><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>b</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>H</mi><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>14</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mrow><mn>1.01</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0.02</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0.56</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>0.02</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>8.975</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">pH=14-\left({\rm pK}_b+\log{\frac{n_{salt}+n_{HCl}}{n_{base}-n_{HCl}}}\right)=14+\log{\left(1.8\times{10}^{-5}\right)-\log{\frac{1.01+0.02}{0.56-0.02}}}=8.975 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group StudentAns" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-32-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>P</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msubsup><mi>P</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msub><mi>P</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mfrac><mo>;</mo><msub><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.803em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>P</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msubsup><mi>P</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msub><mi>P</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mfrac><mo>;</mo><msub><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo class="MJX-variant" stretchy="false">⇌</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>P</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo>×</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>0.7</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>7.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>a</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-32">K_P=\frac{P_{NO_2}^2}{P_{N_2O_4}};N_2O_4\left(g\right)\rightleftharpoons 2{\rm NO}_2(g) \\
\therefore\ P_{NO_2}=\sqrt{K_p\times P_{N_2O_4}}=\sqrt{0.7\times8\times{10}^{-3}}=7.5\times{10}^{-2} atm
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 8 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন এসিডটি সবচেয়ে তীব্র?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group StudentAns" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-40-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2.95</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mi>M</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-842" style="width: 7.425em; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-928" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-932"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-933"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-934" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-935" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-936" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>w</mi></msub></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>5.474</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>14</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>2.34</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mi>M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-44">\left[{\rm OH}^-\right]=\sqrt{K_w}=\sqrt{5.474\times{10}^{-14}\ }=2.34\times{10}^{-7}M </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        <br>

position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1001.31em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-998"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-999"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1000" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1001" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.768em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1002" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1003" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1004" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">14</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1005" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1006" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">p</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1007"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1008" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1009" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1011" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10.813</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>p</mi><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>b</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>6.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3.187</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mi>a</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>14</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>p</mi><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>b</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>10.813</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-48">pK_b=-\log{\left(6.5\times{10}^{-4}\right)}=3.187 \\
\therefore{\rm pK}_a=14-pK_b=10.813 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 14 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: red">Incorrect</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-54-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>25</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1050" style="width: 2.647em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.163em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.16em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1051"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1052"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.93em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1053"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1054"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1055" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">25</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1056" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1057" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>p</mi><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>d</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>d</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>p</mi><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>0.24</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1.738</mn><mo>≈</mo><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-57">pH=pK_a+  \log \frac{\left[salt\right]}{[acid]} \Rightarrow \frac{\left[salt\right]}{[acid]} ={10}^{pH-pK_a}={10}^{0.24}=1.738\approx\frac{7}{4}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 15 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি উভমুখী বিক্রিয়ার&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>40.5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>c</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>5.5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1145" style="width: 10.769em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-65-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>c</mi></msub><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0394;</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>661.26</mn><mi>K</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1212" style="width: 14.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1011.6em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1213"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1214"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1215" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1216" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1217" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1218" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1219" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1220" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1221"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.322em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.13em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1222"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1223" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1224"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1225" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">R</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1226" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">T<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1227" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.256em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1228"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1229"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1230" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">Δ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1231" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1232" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1233" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">T<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1234" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1235" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">661.26</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1236" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.398em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>c</mi></msub><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup><mo>∴</mo><mi>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>661.26</mn><mi>K</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-65">
K_p=K_c\left(RT\right)^{\Delta n}\therefore T=661.26K 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 16 </span>

font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.34em, 4.1em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.859em, 1000.49em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 0.486em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1295" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1296"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.269em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.9em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1297" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1298" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1299" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1300" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1301" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.461em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.498em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.593em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo class="MJX-variant" stretchy="false">⇌</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-67">\frac{1}{5}N_2\left(g\right)+\frac{3}{5}H_2\left(g\right) \rightleftharpoons \frac{2}{5}NH_3(g) </script></span>&nbsp;বিক্রিয়ার সাম্যধ্রুবক কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span id="MathJax-Span-1423" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.256em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.117em, 1001.39em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1424"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1001.39em, 3.895em, 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.33em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1427" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.648em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.303em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></msub><mrow><msubsup><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></msubsup><mo>×</mo><msubsup><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></msubsup></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">&amp;</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>N</mi><msubsup><mi>H</mi><mn>3</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow></msubsup></mrow><mrow><msubsup><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow></msubsup><mo>×</mo><msubsup><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow></msubsup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></msub><mrow><msubsup><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></msubsup><mo>×</mo><msubsup><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></msubsup></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></msup><mo>=</mo><mroot><msup><mi>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>5</mn></mroot></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">K=\frac{{\rm NH}_3}{N_2^{\frac{1}{2}}\times H_2^{\frac{3}{2}}}\ \&\ K_1=\frac{NH_3^{\frac{2}{5}}}{N_2^{\frac{1}{5}}\times H_2^{\frac{3}{5}}}=\left(\frac{{\rm NH}_3}{N_2^{\frac{1}{2}}\times H_2^{\frac{3}{2}}}\right)^\frac{2}{5}=\sqrt[5]{K^2}   </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>M</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1000</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>150</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>36.5</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.0913</mn><mi>M</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>14</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>l</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>M</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>12.96</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1433" style="width: 24.264em; </span>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 18 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>4&nbsp;pH&nbsp;বিশিষ্ট বাফার দ্রবণ তৈরি করতে হলে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-75-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>80</mn><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0.5</mn><mi>M</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1464" style="width: 6.596em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1465"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1466" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">80</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1467" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1468" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1469" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1470" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1471" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1472" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>80</mn><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>0.5</mn><mi>M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-75">80mL\ \ 0.5M</script></span>&nbsp;ফরমিক এসিডের দ্রবণে কত আয়তন&nbsp;0.01M&nbsp;সোডিয়াম ফরমেট যোগ করতে হবে?                                     </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ধরি,&nbsp;x&nbsp; mL&nbsp; HCOONa&nbsp;লাগবে।</p>

width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1565" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size3;">)</span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.953em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.198em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>p</mi><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi>H</mi><mi>C</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>N</mi><mi>a</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi>H</mi><mi>C</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>3.8</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.01</mn><mo>×</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>80</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>80</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>80</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-81">pH=pK_a+ \log \frac{[HCOONa]}{[HCOOH]} \Rightarrow4=3.8+\log{\left(\frac{\frac{0.01\times x}{80+x}}{\frac{0.5\times80}{80+x}}\right)}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.01</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>80</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>0.2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6339.57</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1566" style="width: 15.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.953em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1012.91em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1567"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1568" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1569" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.17em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.105em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1570"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1571" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.01</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1572" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1573" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.13em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1574"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1575" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1576" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1577" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">80</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.34em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1578" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1579" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1580"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1581"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1582" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1583"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1584"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1585" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1586" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1589" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6339.57</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1590" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1591" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1592" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-87-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><munder><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>H</mi><mi>I</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mstyle mathsize=&quot;1.44em&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><munder><mi>a</mi><mstyle><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow></mstyle></munder></mrow></mstyle></munder><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-88-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>0.8</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1681" style="width: 6.846em; top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1682"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1683" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1684" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1688" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-89-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1691" style="width: 3.855em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.158em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1003.12em, 2.461em, -999.998em);
