<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-90-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.6</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>e</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1700" style="width: 6.764em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1005.29em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1701"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1702" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1703" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1704" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1705" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.6</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1706" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1707" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1708" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1709" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1710" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.6</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>e</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-90">\therefore a=1.6\ mole\ </script></span></p>

<p>[<strong>বিশেষ দ্রষ্টব্য:</strong> বিযোজনের পরিমাণ ও বিযোজন মাত্রা এ দুটো পদ নিয়ে অনেকের মধ্যে বিভ্রান্তির সৃষ্টি হয়।&nbsp;&nbsp;যদি &zwj;a মোল পদার্থের&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-91-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1712" style="width: 2.584em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.092em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.05em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1713"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1714" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1715" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1716" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1717" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1718" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-91">\alpha\ mol </script></span>&nbsp;বিয়জিত হয়, তবে বিযোজনের পরিমাণ হচ্ছে&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1719" style="width: 2.584em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.092em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.05em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1720"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1721" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1722" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1723" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1724" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1725" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-92">\alpha\ mol</script></span>&nbsp;। অপরদিকে ‘বিযোজন মাত্রা’ বলতে বোঝায় সে পদার্থের কত ভগ্নাংশ বিযোজিত হয়েছে সে সংখ্যা, অর্থাৎ বিযোজন মাত্রা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1726" style="width: 0.576em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.453em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1000.45em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1727"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1728" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>β</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-93">\beta</script></span>&nbsp;হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-94-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1729" style="width: 2.748em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.256em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.26em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1730"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1731" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1732" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1733" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.576em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1734" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1735" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.58em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.576em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>α</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-94">\beta=\frac{\alpha}{a}</script></span>&nbsp;। এ ভগ্নাংশকে অনেকক্ষেত্রে 100 দ্বারা গুণ করে শতকরা হিসাবে প্রকাশ করা হয়। যেমন,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-95-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1736" style="width: 5.125em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1737"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1738" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1739" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1740" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1741" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1742" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1743" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1744"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1746" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1749" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-95">5\ mol\ N_2O_4</script></span>&nbsp;নিয়ে উত্তপ্ত করার পর 2 mol বিযোজিত হলে ‘বিযোজনের পরিমাণ’ বলতে 2 mol বোঝাবে। অপরদিকে বিযোজন মাত্রা হচ্ছে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-96-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.4</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>0.4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>100</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>40</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1750" style="width: 12.133em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1754" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1759" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1760" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </span>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 21 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>দুর্বল এসিড&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-97-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi>C</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>1.58</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1764" style="width: 17.252em;                                 <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>তাপমাত্রা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>400</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>500</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1840" style="width: 7.106em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>A&nbsp;দ্রবণে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-107-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1896" style="width: 5.535em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.51em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.51em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1897"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1898"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1899" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1900"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1901" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.945em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1902" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1903" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1904" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1905" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1906"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1907"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1908" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1909"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1910"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1911" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1912" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.453em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-107">\left[H^+\right]={10}^{-3}</script></span></p>

<p>B&nbsp;দ্রবণে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-108-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1913" style="width: 5.535em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.51em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.51em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1914"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1915"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1916" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1917"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.945em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1919" style="font-size: 70.7%; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-109-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1930" style="width: 0.658em;                                             <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-113-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>P</mi><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1990" style="width: 2.735em;                         <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 25 </span>

height: 2.461em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>S</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo class="MJX-variant" stretchy="false">⇌</mo><mi>S</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><mi>N</mi><mi>O</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-118">SO_2(g)+\ NO_2(g) \rightleftharpoons SO_3(g)+NO(g)</script></span>;&nbsp;বিক্রিয়ার&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-119-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.86</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2057" style="width: 5.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.361em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1004.32em, 2.647em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2058"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2059"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.269em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.9em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2060" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.859em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2061" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2062" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2063" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0.86</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.407em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.275em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.86</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-119">K_p=0.86</script></span>&nbsp;।&nbsp;বিক্রিয়ার কোন একটি অবস্থায়, আংশিক চাপ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-121-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>p</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2123" style="width: 4.797em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.936em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1003.94em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2124"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2125" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2126" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2127" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">Q</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2128" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2130" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2131" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2132" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.398em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo>&gt;</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>p</mi></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-121">\therefore Q_p>K_p</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-122-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2133" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2134"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2135" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-122">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;বিক্রিয়াটি পশ্চাৎমুখী।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

            </div>
            <div class="TakeExamHeader">
        
        
        

        <h3>Engineering Weekly MCQ Practice Exam W-06 2022</h3>
                        
                    
                    

    </div><div class="TakeExamBody">
        
        
        

        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 35 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো দ্রবণের&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-231-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8.5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3870" style="width: 4.883em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.988em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1003.95em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3871"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3872" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3873" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3874" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3875" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">8.5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8.5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-231">pH=8.5</script></span>&nbsp;হলে দ্রবণে কতটি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3877"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3878"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.567em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; [দ্রবণের আয়তন&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-233-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>2.3</mn><mi>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3882" style="width: 3.69em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.02em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1002.98em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3883"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3884" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3885" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">2.3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3886" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>2.3</mn><mi>L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-233">=2.3 L</script></span>]</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-238-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>l</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>8.5</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3.16</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2235;</mo><mn>2.3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>l</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>r</mi><mi>e</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3931" style="width: 25.084em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 20.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1020.49em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3932"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3933" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3934" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3935" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3936" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3937" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3938" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3939"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.945em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3941" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3942" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3943" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3944" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">8.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3945" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3946" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3947" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3948"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3949" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.945em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3950" style="font-size: 70.7%; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3955" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3956"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3957"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3958" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3959"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3960"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3961" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3962" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3963" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3964" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3965" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3966"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3967" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3968"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3969"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3970" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3971" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3972" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∵</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3973" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.3</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3974" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3975" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3976" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3977" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3978" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3979" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.453em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mi>l</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>8.5</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3.16</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>∵</mo><mn>2.3</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>l</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>r</mi><mi>e</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-238">-log\left[H^+\right]=8.5\Rightarrow\left[H^+\right]=3.16\times{10}^{-9}molL^{-1}  \because2.3 \  litre</script></span>;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-239-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3.16</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2.3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>7.27</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>7.27</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>6.02</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>23</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4.38</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>15</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3980" style="width: 34.633em; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 36 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>চারটি ক্ষারকের&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-240-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>p</mi><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>b</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4043" style="width: 2.163em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-241-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>b</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4049" style="width: 1.273em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.03em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4050"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4051"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4052" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 37 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>10K&nbsp;তাপমাত্রায় নিচের কোন বিক্রিয়ার ক্ষেত্রে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-243-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>P</mi></msub><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>?</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4060" style="width: 5.74em;                             <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 38 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: #8d8d8d">Skipped</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>তাপমাত্রা বৃদ্ধি করলে নিচের বিক্রিয়ার জন্য কোনটি সঠিক?</p>

width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.3em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-4219"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4220"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4221" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 2.461em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.411em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>X</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>Z</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo class="MJX-variant" stretchy="false">⇌</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>X</mi><msub><mi>Z</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∆</mo><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>k</mi><mi>J</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><msup><mi>l</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-249">X_2\left(g\right)+4Z_2\left(g\right) \rightleftharpoons 2XZ_4\left(g\right);\ \ ∆H=+x kJmol^{-1}</script></span></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 39 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>4°C&nbsp;তাপমাত্রায় বিশুদ্ধ পানির মোলার ঘনমাত্রা কত? display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.281em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1003.24em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4248"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4249" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-4250" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4251" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block;                                         <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ঘনমাত্রা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-259-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1000</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>18.016</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><msup><mi>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1000</mn><mn>18.016</mn></mfrac><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>55.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4317" style="width: 19.51em; </span>

                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 40 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>বিক্রিয়া অনুপাত&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-260-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>Q</mi><mi>C</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4362" style="width: 1.753em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.784em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4366" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.455em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1001.46em, 2.535em, -999.998em);                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-274-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; padding-left: 0.289em;">820.47</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-4620" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4621" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4622" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4623"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4624" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4625" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.648em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>×</mo><msubsup><mi>P</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mn>3</mn></msubsup></mrow><msubsup><mi>P</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mfrac><mn>21</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>63</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>16</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>820.47</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mi>t</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-277">\therefore\ K_p=\frac{P_{N_2}\times P_{H_2}^3}{P_{NH_3}^2}=\frac{\frac{21}{100}\times20\times\left(\frac{63}{100}\times20\right)^3}{\left(\frac{16}{100}\times20\right)^2}=820.47\ atm^2 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4767" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4768" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">160</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>c</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><msub><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>[</mo><msub><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>]</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><msub><mi>B</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>0.5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>0.1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>160</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-282">K_c=\frac{\left[A_2B\right]^2}{\left[A_2\right]^2\times\left[B_2\right]}=\frac{2^2}{{0.5}^2\times0.1} =160</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-288-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>N</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>H</mi><mi>S</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4789" style="width: 4.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.404em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.4em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4790"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4791" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4792" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4793" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4794" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">S<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4795"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4796" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4797" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>N</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>H</mi><mi>S</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-288">NaHSO_4 </script></span>&nbsp;একটি মৃদু এসিডীয় লবণ।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-289-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4798" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4799"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4800" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-289">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;এর&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-290-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mn>7</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>7</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4801" style="width: 9.018em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.379em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1007.38em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4802"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4803" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4804" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4805" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&lt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4806" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">7</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-4807" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-4808" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4809" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4810" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4811" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4812" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4813" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4814" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">7</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>&lt;</mo><mn>7</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>7</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-290">pH<7\ \ \therefore p OH>7</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 44 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: #8d8d8d">Skipped</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-291-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4.75</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4815" style="width: 4.212em; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4.75</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-291">4.75\ pH</script></span>&nbsp;বিশিষ্ট বাফার দ্রবণ প্রস্তুতিতে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-300-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></mrow><mi>a</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>s</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msub><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>a</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>4.75</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1.33</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>s</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msub><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>a</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow></msub></mfrac></mrow></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4907" style="width: 26.314em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-301-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>s</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.02</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>4.75</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>1.33</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow></msup><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1023.03em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -2.662em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-5017" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5018" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5019" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.58em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5020" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-5021"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5022"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5023" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5024" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5025" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5026" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5027" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5028" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.01496</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5029" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5030" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5031" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5032" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5033" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5034" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5035"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5036" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.01496</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5037" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5038" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">96</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5039" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5040" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5041" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5042" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5043" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.44</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5044" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5045" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.998em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>s</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.02</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>4.75</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1.33</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></msup><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>s</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.01496</mn><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.01496</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>96</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>g</mi><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.44</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-301">\Rightarrow n_{salt}=0.02\times{10}^{4.75+\log(1.33\times{10}^5)}\\
  \Rightarrow n_{salt}=0.01496mol=\left(0.01496\times96\right)gm=1.44gm </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
