                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-304-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>O</mi><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>3.6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4.4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5083" style="width: 20.248em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1016.56em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5084"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5085"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.58em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5086" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-5100"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5101"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5102" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5103" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5105" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5106" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5107" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-5108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5109" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5110" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5117" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-305-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5132" style="width: 0.658em; top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5133"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5134" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-305">\therefore </script></span>&nbsp;বিক্রিয়ার পর অবশিষ্ট&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-306-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5135" style="width: 9.756em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-307-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5160" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5161"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5162" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-307">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;দ্রবণটি অম্লীয়।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>None</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-319-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub><mi>c</mi></mfrac></msqrt><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>c</mi></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5439" style="width: 15.002em; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>α</mi><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub><mi>c</mi></mfrac></msqrt><mo>×</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub><mo>×</mo><mi>c</mi></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-319">\left[H^+\right]=\alpha c=\sqrt{\frac{K_a}{c}}\times c=\sqrt{K_a\times c}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-320-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>1.8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>6.806</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5468" style="width: 20.658em; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 48 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi>C</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi><mo class="MJX-variant" stretchy="false">⇌</mo><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi>C</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>O</mi><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>O</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-327">C_2H_5OH+CH_3COOH \rightleftharpoons CH_3COOC_2H_5+H_2O</script></span></p>

<p>এখানে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-328-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi>C</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5634" style="width: 7.871em; <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 50 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সমআয়তনের&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-333-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>M</mi><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>H</mi><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-5703" style="width: 4.324em; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5839" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.22</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 6.436em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -5.598em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 6.703em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>V</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><mi>M</mi><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>H</mi><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>≡</mo><mfrac><mi>V</mi><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mi>M</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mi>V</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><mi>M</mi><mn>50</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>H</mi><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>≡</mo><mfrac><mi>V</mi><mn>50</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mi>M</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi>V</mi><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>V</mi><mn>50</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>V</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>50</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.06</mn><mi>M</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>−</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1.22</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-335">V\ mL\ \frac{M}{10}\ HCl\equiv\frac{V}{10}\ mL\ 1M\ H^+ \\
V\ mL\ \frac{M}{50}\ HCl\equiv\frac{V}{50}\ mL\ 1M\ H^+ \\
\left[H^+\right]=\frac{\left(\frac{V}{10}+\frac{V}{50}\right)\times1}{2V}=\ \frac{\left(\frac{1}{10}+\frac{1}{50}\right)}{2}=0.06M\  
\therefore pH=\ -\log{\left[H^+\right]}=1.22 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                    
                    

    </div><div class="TakeExamHeader">
        
        
        

        <h3>Varsity Standard Weekly MCQ Live Exam 2022</h3>

                                        <div class="serial">

width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-908" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.498em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo class="MJX-variant" stretchy="false">⇌</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-54">\rm N_2(g)+3H_2(g)\rightleftharpoons 2NH_3(g)</script></span>&nbsp;বিক্রিয়ার ক্ষেত্রে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; clip: rect(3.144em, 1002.14em, 4.374em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-980"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-981" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-982"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-983" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-984" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-985" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.46em; left: 2.234em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-986"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-987"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-988" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-989" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-61-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi></mrow></msup><mo>;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-990" style="width: 15.084em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1004"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1005"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1006" style="font-size: 70.7%; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-62-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></msub><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1018" style="width: 7.912em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1024" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1025" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block;                         </div><div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 12 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি বাফার দ্রবণে 0.2&nbsp;মোল দুর্বল মনোবেসিক এসিড <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-63-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1039" style="width: 6.559em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.367em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1005.11em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1040"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1041" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1042"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.753em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1001.31em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1043"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1044"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1045" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1046" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.761em; left: 1.343em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1047" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1048" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1049" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-63">\rm ({\rm pK}_a=4.8)\ </script></span>এবং 0.02&nbsp;মোল এসিডের সোডিয়াম লবণ আছে। দ্রবণের pH&nbsp;মান কোনটি?&nbsp;</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-64-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi></mrow></msub></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mn>0.02</mn><mn>0.2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>0.1</mn></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>3.8</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1052" style="width: 29.223em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 23.936em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1023.89em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1053"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1054" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1055" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1056" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4.8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1105" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.597em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></mrow></msub></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>0.02</mn><mn>0.2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>0.1</mn></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>3.8</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-64">\rm pH={\rm pK}_a+\log{\frac{n_{salt}}{n_{acid}}}=4.8+\log{\frac{0.02}{0.2}}=4.8+\log{0.1}=4.8-1=3.8</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 13 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিম্নের কোন বিক্রিয়ায় চাপ বৃদ্ধি করলে সাম্যবস্থা ডান দিকে সরে যায়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                            </div>

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot;                                             </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>যদি বিক্রিয়ক অপেক্ষা উৎপাদে গ্যাসীয় মোল কম থাকে তখন আবদ্ধ পাত্রে চাপ কমে। সেক্ষেত্রে চাপ বাড়ালে সাম্যাবস্থা ডান দিকে সরে যায়। সম্মুখমুখী বিক্রিয়া বৃদ্ধি করে।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 15 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সাম্যাবস্থায় বিয়োজন মাত্রা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1211" style="width: 0.784em; width: 0px; height: 2.2em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.639em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-69">\rm \alpha</script></span> এবং বিক্রিয়াপাত্রের আয়তন V&nbsp;হলে, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-70-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21CC;</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1214" style="width: 10.918em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 1.529em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1232" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1233" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1234" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1235" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.498em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo class="MJX-variant" stretchy="false">⇌</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-70">\rm N_2O_4(g)\rightleftharpoons 2{\rm NO}_2(g)</script></span> বিক্রিয়ার জন্য কোনটি সঠিক?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 250px; height: 64px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi></mfrac></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1293" style="width: 12.625em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.33em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.453em, 1010.33em, 2.953em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1294"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1295"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1296" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1297" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1298" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1299" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">

width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1388" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1389" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1390" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1391" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1392" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 17 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো দ্রবণের pH&nbsp;এর মান 5&nbsp;থেকে 7-এ বৃদ্ধি পেলে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-84-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1545" style="width: 1.678em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1001.38em, 2.312em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1546"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1547"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.71em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1548" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1549" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.2em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.048em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-84">\rm H^+</script></span> এর ঘনমাত্রা পূর্বের কতগুণ হয়?</p>

                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ঘনমাত্রার পরিবর্তন <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-86-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1555" style="width: 5.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.633em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1004.63em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1556"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1557" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1558" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.518em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.39em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1559"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1560"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1561"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1562" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1563"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1564"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1565" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1566" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.39em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1567"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1568"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1569"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1570" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1571"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1572"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1573" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1574" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.52em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.518em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1575" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1578" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-86">=\frac{{10}^{-7}}{{10}^{-5}}=\frac{1}{100}</script></span>&nbsp;গুণ।</p>
</span>

<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 18 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন মিশ্রণের প্রকৃতি অম্লীয় হবে?&nbsp;</p>

                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 19 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন এসিডের&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-91-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1709" style="width: 2.163em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.753em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1001.75em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1710"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1711"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.753em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1001.31em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1712"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1713"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1714" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1715" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.761em; left: 1.343em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1716" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.2em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-91">\rm {\rm pK}_a</script></span> এর মান সবচেয়ে কম?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1717" style="width: 3.281em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>এখানে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-96-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1754" style="width: 2.707em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.22em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1755"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1756" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1757" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1758"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1760" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-96">\rm HNO_3</script></span> সবচেয়ে শক্তিশালী এসিড। তাই <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-97-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1761" style="width: 1.764em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1762"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1763"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1001.31em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1764"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1765"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1766" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1767" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </span>

<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 20 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো এক ক্ষারকীয় <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-98-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1769" style="width: 5.553em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.547em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1004.44em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1770"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1771" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1772" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1773" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1774" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1775" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1777" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1778" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1779" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-98">\rm Acid\ (HA)</script></span>এর বিয়োজন ধ্রুবক <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-99-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1780" style="width: 5.479em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.473em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1004.47em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1781"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1782" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1783" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1784" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.977em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1785"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1786"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1787" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1788"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1789"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1790" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1791" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-99">\rm 2.5\times{10}^{-4}</script></span>&nbsp;এবং বিয়োজন মাত্রা 5% হলে এই দ্রবণের ঘনমাত্রা কত হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.36em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.363em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.994em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1002.87em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.432em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1864"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1865" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1866" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1867"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1868"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1869"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1870" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1871"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1872"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1873" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1874" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1002.67em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.309em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1875"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1876" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">25</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1877" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1878"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1879"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1880"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1881" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1882"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1883"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1884" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1885" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.99em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.994em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1886" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1887" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1888" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1889" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.147em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.402em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></msub><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>25</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-104">\rm \alpha^2=\frac{K_a}{C}\Rightarrow C=\frac{K_a}{\alpha^2}=\frac{2.5\times{10}^{-4}}{\left(5\times{10}^{-2}\right)^2}=\frac{2.5\times{10}^{-4}}{25\times{10}^{-4}}=0.1\ M</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-105-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1890" style="width: 10.248em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.404em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1008.2em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1891"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1892" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1893" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1894" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">[</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1895"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1896" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1897" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1898" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1899" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1900" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1901" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1902" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1903" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1904" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1905"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1906"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1907" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1908"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1909"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1910" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1911" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1912" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">]</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-105">\rm \therefore\left[\alpha=\frac{5}{100}=5\times{10}^{-2}\right]</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
</div>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msup><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-155" style="width: 8.732em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.215em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-180" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-181" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
