                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 6 </span>
                                            <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: green">Correct</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>অম্লীয় বাফার দ্রবণের ক্ষমতা সবচেয়ে বেশি হয় যখন–<br>
(i) [লবণ]/[অম্ল] =1 হয়<br>
(ii) <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-200" style="width: 5.33em;                                             <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.02</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-244" style="width: 7.607em;                                 </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                <div class="row  uddipokText" style="display: block;">
                                    <p><strong>নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে পরবর্তী দুটি প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:</strong><br>
HA একটি দুর্বল এসিড। এসিডটির সাথে তীব্র ক্ষার সহযোগে লবণ প্রস্তুত করা হলো। লবণ ও এসিডটি মিলে বাফার দ্রবণ তৈরি হল। [এসিডটির <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-18-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></msub><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>4.75</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-257" style="width: 6.522em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.33em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1005.29em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-258"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-259"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.753em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1001.31em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-260"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-261"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-262" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-263" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                                 </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 8 </span>

                                            <p>এসিডটির বিয়োজন ধ্রুবক কত?</p>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></msub></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1.8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-317" style="width: 11.232em; 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-387" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-388"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-389"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-390" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-391" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-392" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-393" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-394" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-395" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-396" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-397" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.35</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0.35</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-24">\rm pH=pK_a+log \frac{[Salt]}{[Acid]}⇒\frac{[Salt]}{[Acid]}=10^{pH-pKa}=0.35 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
